effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.

effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
